AddResourceTag.document: This API is used to associate resources with tags.
AddResourceTag.name: Associating Resources and Tags

AttachResourcesTag.document: This API is used to associate a tag with multiple resources.
AttachResourcesTag.name: Associates tag with resources in batches

CreateTag.document: This API is used to create a tag key and tag value pair.
CreateTag.name: Creating Tags

CreateTags.document: This API is used to create multiple tag key-value pairs.
CreateTags.name: Batch creates tags

DeleteResourceTag.document: This API is used to unassociate tags and resources.
DeleteResourceTag.name: Unassociating Resources and Tags

DeleteTag.document: This API is used to delete a tag key and tag value pair.
DeleteTag.name: Deleting Tags

DeleteTags.document: This API is used to delete tag keys and tag values in batches.
DeleteTags.name: Batch deletes tags

DescribeProjects.document: This API is used to get project lists.
DescribeProjects.name: Gets project lists

DescribeResourceTags.document: This API is used to query the tags associated with a resource.
DescribeResourceTags.name: Queries tags associated with resource

DescribeResourceTagsByResourceIds.document: This API is used to query the tag key-value pairs associated with an existing resource.
DescribeResourceTagsByResourceIds.name: Batch queries tags associated with resource

DescribeResourceTagsByResourceIdsSeq.document: This API is used to view the tags associated with a resource in sequence.
DescribeResourceTagsByResourceIdsSeq.name: Views tags associated with resource in sequence

DescribeResourceTagsByTagKeys.document: This API is used to get resource tags based on tag keys.
DescribeResourceTagsByTagKeys.name: Gets resource tags based on tag keys

DescribeResourcesByTags.document: This API is used to query resources by tags.
DescribeResourcesByTags.name: Queries resources by tags

DescribeResourcesByTagsUnion.document: This API is used to query resource list by tags.
DescribeResourcesByTagsUnion.name: Queries resource list by tags

DescribeTagKeys.document: This API is used to query tag keys in an existing tag list.
DescribeTagKeys.name: Querying Tag Keys

DescribeTagValues.document: This API is used to query tag values in an existing tag list.
DescribeTagValues.name: Querying Tag Values

DescribeTagValuesSeq.document: This API is used to query tag values in a created tag list.
DescribeTagValuesSeq.name: Queries tag values in sequence

DescribeTags.document: This API is used to query existing tag lists.
DescribeTags.name: Querying Tag Lists

DescribeTagsSeq.document: This API is used to query the created tag lists.
DescribeTagsSeq.name: Queries tag lists in sequence

DetachResourcesTag.document: This API is used to unbind a tag from multiple resources.
DetachResourcesTag.name: Unbinds tag from resources in batches

GetResources.document: This API is used to query the list of resources associated with a tag.
GetResources.name: Queries resource tag list

GetTagKeys.document: This API is used to query the list of tag keys.
GetTagKeys.name: Queries tag key list

GetTagValues.document: This API is used to query tag values in the list of created tags.
GetTagValues.name: Queries tag value list

GetTags.document: This API is used to get the list of created tags.
GetTags.name: Gets tag list

ModifyResourceTags.document: This API is used to modify all tags associated with a resource.
ModifyResourceTags.name: Batch Modifying Tags Associated with a Resource

ModifyResourcesTagValue.document: This API is used to modify the tag value corresponding to a tag key associated with multiple resources.
ModifyResourcesTagValue.name: Modifies tag value associated with resources in batches

TagResources.document: This API is used to create and bind a tag uniformly to multiple specified resources of multiple Tencent Cloud services.
TagResources.name: Binds tag to resources

UnTagResources.document: This API is used to unbind a tag uniformly from multiple specified resources of multiple Tencent Cloud services.
UnTagResources.name: Unbinds tag from resources

UpdateResourceTagValue.document: This API is used to modify the values of tags associated with a resource (the tag key does not change).
UpdateResourceTagValue.name: Modifying Resource Tag Values

FailedResource.document:
Information of failed resources.
This is returned when resource tag binding or unbinding fails.

members.document: Six-segment descriptions of failed resources
members.name: Resource

members.document: Error code
members.name: Code

members.document: Error message
members.name: Message

members.document:
Six-segment resource description list. Tencent Cloud uses a six-segment value to describe a resource.
For example, ResourceList.1 = qcs::${ServiceType}:${Region}:${Account}:${ResourcePreifx}/${ResourceId}.
If this parameter is passed in, the list of all matching resources will be returned, and the specified `MaxResults` will become invalid.
Value range of N: 0–9
members.name: ResourceList

members.document:
Tag key and value.
If multiple tags are specified, resources bound to all such tags will be queried.
Value range of N: 0–5
There can be up to 10 `TagValues` in each `TagFilters`.

members.name: Resource

members.document: The tags to be added or modified. If the resource described by `Resource` is not associated with the input tag keys, an association will be added. If the tag keys are already associated, the values corresponding to the associated tag keys will be modified to the input values. This API must contain either `ReplaceTags` or `DeleteTag`, and these two parameters cannot include the same tag keys. This parameter can be omitted, but it cannot be an empty array.
members.name: ReplaceTags

members.document: The tags to be disassociated. This API must contain either `ReplaceTags` or `DeleteTag`, and these two parameters cannot include the same tag keys. This parameter can be omitted, but it cannot be an empty array.
members.name: DeleteTags

members.document:
Six-segment resource description list. Tencent Cloud uses a six-segment value to describe a resource. For more information, see [CAM](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/598/67350?from_cn_redirect=1) > Overview > API List > Six-Segment Resource Information.
For example: ResourceList.1 = qcs::${ServiceType}:${Region}:uin/${Account}:${ResourcePrefix}/${ResourceId}.
Value range of N: 0–9
members.name: ResourceList

members.document:
Tag key and value.
If multiple tags are specified, all such tags will be created and bound to the specified resources.
For each resource, each tag key can have only one value. If you try to add an existing tag key, the corresponding tag value will be updated to the new value.
Non-existent tags will be automatically created.
Value range of N: 0–9
members.name: Tags

members.document:
Information of failed resources.
When tag creating and binding succeeds, the returned `FailedResources` will be empty.
When tag creating and binding partially or completely fails, the returned `FailedResources` will display the details of failed resources.
members.name: FailedResources
